anniversary.title: Sicut Dudum, forbidding the enslavement by the Spanish of the Guanche natives in Canary Islands who ...
anniversary.description: Sicut Dudum, forbidding the enslavement by the Spanish of the Guanche natives in Canary Islands who had converted, or were converting to, Christianity, is promulgated by Pope Eugene IV.

app.app_title: Sicut Dudum: The Forgotten Decree Against Slavery
app.description: An interactive exploration of Pope Eugene IV's 1435 papal bull condemning the enslavement of Canary Islands natives
